Hawona Sullivan Janzen bụ ónyé édémédé America, ónyé na-ede uri, na ónyé na-eme ihe nkírí nke bi na Minnesota
Ọrụ ya na-enyocha ọdịdị nke ịhụnanya, mfu, iru uju, na olileanya.
A mụrụ Sullivan Janzen na Shreveport, Louisiana.

A gụrụ uri Sullivan Janzen na National Public Radio. Ọ na-abụ abụ jazz improvisational na Sonoglyph Collective. Ọ bụ ónyé ndụmọdụ màkà Forecast Public Art na Hennepin Theatre Trust, yana ónyé nhazi gallery màkà Urban Research and Outreach Engagement Center na Mahadum Minnesota. Ọ bụ ónyé nhazi màkà usoro ọgụgụ uri nke Literary Witnesses.
N'afọ 2017, o sonyere na Poetry of Resistance and Change, ébé e gosipụtara ọrụ ya n'ụzọ buru ibu n'akụkụ ụlọ ọha

Ọrụ ahụ, nke Monica Sheets Larson haziri n'okpuru áhà Sister Black Press, gosipụtara ntinye nke ọtụtụ narị kaadị e bírí ebi na nnukwu akụkụ na-egosi uri sitere na Junauda Petrus, Michael Kleber-Diggs, Maitreyi Ray, Marion Gomez, na Ben Weaver

E gosipụtara uri ahụ n'èzí ụlọ ọrụ Soap Factory màkà izu atọ na 2017, e mekwara ihe omume ọha na eze nke malitere site na ịgba ịnyịnya ígwè nke ónyé na-ese ihe na-eduzi, gosipụtara ọgụgụ abụ, ma bipụta ya na ndụ site na iji ígwè obibi akwụkwọ ịnyịnya ígwè.
